summary: Can\'t find a mod that change your ugly Camilla Vanilla NPC into beautiful NPC ? This mod is made for you ! ( Don\'t forget to endorse if you like this mod ! )
descriptionHtml:
First, sorry for my bad english, I\'m a French modder so I will try to explain as the best I can !
This is one of my first Skyrim mods, so please be forgiving !
 
I\'ve never find a mod that [u]really[/u] change Camilla, so I made one.

This is a part of my mod which includes all NPCs I created: [url=http://adf.ly/C2AOs]Beautiful NPCs Project -WIP-[/url] [b][color=red]*[/color][/b]

[b][color=red]*[/color][/b] When you will click on this link below you will be redirected on a page where you will wait 5 seconds to help me with an [u]indirect[/u] donation, keep in mind [u]you don\'t pay anything[/u], you just wait 5 seconds to help me, if you don\'t want to help me feel free to click on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22660]this link[/url], this is the direct link to my mod.

[color=red][b]/!\\ If the download link doesn\'t work please try it again soon, this is a host maintenance problem /!\\[/b][/color]

09-09-2012: Adf.ly is up now ! You can download the mod right now ! =D 

My other NPCs mods:
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23944]]BH - Beautiful Hulda[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23836]BATH - Beautiful Aela The Huntress[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23845]BVGM - Beautiful Vignar Gray-Mane[/url]

__________________________________

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod  -[i]by CherryHotaling[/i]-[/url]

Armor used: 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273]Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE -[i]by Caliente[/i]-[/url]

Face mods used: 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females -[i]by BellaGail[/i]-[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face -[i]by tktk1[/i]-[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483]Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps\" -[i]by zzjay[/i]-[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30]No More Blocky Faces -[i]by Xenius[/i]-[/url]

Hair mods used: 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair  -[i]by Apachii[/i]-[/url]
-Tera hair (this one is not on Skyrim Nexus, the download link is in the readme) 



[b]Special Thanks to:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072]zzjay[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/726673]Xenius[/url] for their awesome work on their mods which I use ! :D

AND for [u]EVERY MEMBER[/u] who support me for this mod ! <3 [/b]
author: Fl4sHNoX
